name: Pulled Pork Pizza
description: Epicure’s Pulled Pork Recipe makes a lot of pulled pork. We’ve created this delicious pulled pork recipe to help you make the most of any leftovers. Happy cooking!

ingredients.name: boneless pork shoulder or butt roast

preparation: Place pizza crust on crisper or a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Spread Ranch Dressing over pizza crust.
Top with ‘dollops’ of Pulled Pork. Sprinkle with peppers and onions, then top with mozzarella.
Bake for 10–15 minutes, or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.

summary: This seasoning is a shortcut to the south when you’re in the mood for some BBQ! Grab a slow cooker and let the pork slowly infuse with notes of deep, sweet ‘n tangy barbecue and a hint of smokiness. So good!
